src:
Rikast av de döda – har dragit in ett helt Billerud Korsnäs
Bara för att du har lämnat jordelivet behöver du inte sluta tjäna storkovan. Det visar affärstidningen Forbes årliga lista över de avlidna kändisar som tjänar mest pengar.
02 Nov 2019, 18:15 by Carl Björk

text:
Trump Prayer at White House Fear of Impeachment!

As the impeachment debate is formalized, the US president has gathered supporters of evangelicals to hold a prayer service at the White House.
02 Nov 2019, 18:06 by Bulletin News | bultannews.com
As US President Donald Trump's impeachment debate grows hotter in the country's political circles, a number of evangelical priests, close to Trump's allies, attend a private meeting at the White House for him, Bulletin News reports. They prayed.
Texas Area pastor Robert Jeffers and longtime Trump supporter announced that evangelical leaders met with the president last Tuesday in the Roosevelt Room at the White House. At the meeting, Trump outlined his remarkable achievements, especially in the areas of concern to them. The Evangelists are supporters of the US president and have close ties to the Zionist regime.
According to the Texas pastor, evangelicals at the end of the meeting asked the president if they could pray for him, which was, as always, very welcome. 6% of evangelicals believe Trump should not be impeached and dismissed.
An informal spokesman for Evangelical Consultants on Twitter tweeted the meeting in celebration of the president's achievements Wednesday. Trump formed the Evangelical Advisory Committee during the presidential campaign of the year.
The US House of Representatives on Thursday approved a resolution publicizing the impeachment process of President Donald Trump.
According to the BBC, the vote is the first formal measure to support the impeachment process in the House of Representatives, which Democrats control.
